name: Collapsing Worlds
description:
Have you ever felt an urge to casually destroy some worlds? Well, now you can!

If the game is slow, try different browser (Firefox and Safari seem to work fine) or download a standalone version for Windows or macOS.

Click on tiles, that have at least one adjacent tile of the same type (house, sand, water, tree) to collapse them.

  • Win when there are no tiles left.
  • Lose when there are tiles left, but none of them are adjacent.

Relaunch the game to restart with a different random level.

After a gap has been made, tiles move along an axis to the center to fill the space. The axis alternates after each move.

Rotate the camera by holding the left mouse key.

This is not a full game - just a proof of concept.
